051package org.jfree;
052
053import org.jfree.ui.about.ProjectInfo;
054
055/**
056 * This class contains static information about the JCommon class library.
057 *
058 * @author David Gilbert
059 */
060public final class JCommon {
061
062    /** Information about the project. */
063    public static final ProjectInfo INFO = JCommonInfo.getInstance();
064    
065    /**
066     * Hidden constructor.
067     */
068    private JCommon() {
069        super();
070    }
071    
072    /**
073     * Prints information about JCommon to standard output.
074     *
075     * @param args  no arguments are honored.
076     */
077    public static void main(final String[] args) {
078        System.out.println(JCommon.INFO.toString());
079    }
080
081}
